message: Here's what I like about it:
It combines the instantaneity of chat with the persistence and threading of forums.
It's got a clean and modern UI, that's simple and easy to use.
New comments will float a thread to the top!
And it makes a cool *bwong* noise every time you post.
You can also Star messages. I'm not sure what this means though.

So there is an unofficial Android app.

(POSTED FROM MY ANDROID DEVICE)
Hmm, this is kinda neat. It's actually almost exactly what I was thinking would be a good thing for us to have.
If there's an Android app for this, you fuckers will never get rid of me
I'll bet there's not an app for my 2004 Nokia which only supports Java applications and doesn't really do internet all too well. I should get a new phone.
I'm really happy with mine - cost £89 PAYG, free to unlock, then a rolling month-to-month £10 SIM only contract. And now I can play Chrono Trigger on the bus \o/

I know, right Ant? It's the kind of thing I really wanted to exist. I even spoke half jokingly to SC about us making it because it NEEDED to exist. Forums and IM weren't cutting it anymore. And now it does exist!

Actually I almost suggested that between us we could totally hack something together, but as per usual with my good ideas someone from the past stole it. One day I will catch those time-travelling leaches and I will give them a good talking to!
It's like that time those guys stole my idea for a twitter RPG!
No one could have had that idea but me, how did they do it?!
